content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was tasked with browsing a website for information on the Brno Reservoir trail, but encountered an error due to the website not being resolved. To troubleshoot, I received a command to execute a shell command to ping Google.com. However, the command returned an error indicating that ping was not found on my computer.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo apt-get install -y iputils-ping && ping -c 5 google.com"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo apt-get install -y iputils-ping && ping -c 5 google.com"}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
